page.title: 13MRS. EMILY BARNFATHER'S DAY
page.content:
MRS EMILY BARNFATHER IS AN OLD LADY WHO LIVES IN BROUGH.SHE GETS UP ABOUT 7.OO EVERY MORNING AND MAKES A CUP OF COFFEE.THEN SHE GETS DRESSED AND DOES A FEW JOBS ABOUT THE HOUSE.
IF ITS A NICE MORNING SHE SOMETIMES DOES A SPOT OF GARDENING.SHE LIKES DOING EMBROIDERY AND SHE OFTEN GIVES HER WORK AWAY.SHE IS ALSO VERY GOOD AT ART.
NEXT SHE MAKES DINNER.SHE EATS IT ABOUT 1.00.AFTER DINNER.SHE WASHES UP AND TIDIES AWAY.SOMETIMES SHE COMES ROUND TO GIVE US SWEETS.
AT NIGHT SHE DOES ALOT OF READING SHE GOES TO BED ABOUT 10.00 TAKING A DRINK AND BISCUIT WITH HER.
